JUDGES: András Sajó;Françoise Tulkens;Ireneu Cabral Barreto;Nona Tsotsoria;Vladimiro Zagrebelsky
TEXT: CARDINAL . NORP The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .
CARDINAL . Following the privatisation of the public institute where he was employed as an inspector , on DATE the applicant was appointed to a new post at ORG for the ORG ( ORG ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant brought a case before ORG against ORG and ORG to challenge his appointment .
CARDINAL . On DATE the administrative court dismissed the applicant 's request , holding that his appointment had been effected in accordance with the relevant domestic law .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG upheld the decision of the administrative court and on DATE it rejected the applicant 's rectification request .
